_comment: Team Configuration Template - Customized for team-specific analysis
_description: Template configuration for team-specific ticket analysis. Replace placeholder values with your team's actual settings.

_team_customization._instructions: Replace the following placeholders with your team's actual values:
_team_customization._resolver_groups: Update the resolver_groups array with your team's actual resolver group names
_team_customization._timezone: Set timezone to match your team's primary location
_team_customization._business_hours: Adjust business hours to match your team's working hours
_team_customization._output_directory: Set output directory to your team's shared location if applicable

_common_team_settings._description: Common configurations for different team types
